subject: Invitation for Paper publishing
body:
International Journal on Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication 
Calling papers for Volume 3 | Issue 5 | May 2015 
ISSN: 2321-8169 
Scientific Journal Impact Factor (SJIF) 5.837 
IC Value 5.75 
DOI for each paper: IJRITCC DOI prefix is: 10.17762/ijritcc 


IJRITCC is indexed in Google Scholar, Index Copernicus, Slideshare, Scribd, Academia, ResearchGate and many more. 

Kindly send your paper / manuscript to us by mailing to editor@ijritcc.org 

Submit Manuscript online: http://www.ijritcc.org/submit-your-paper 
IJRITCC Manuscript Template: http://www.ijritcc.org/download/1412663194.doc 

Kindly include research area (Ex: Computer Science, Information Technologies, Electronics & Communication, Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Marine Engineering) along with your paper 

Important Dates: 


Event Last Date 
Manuscript Submission : 31 May 2015 
Acceptance Notification : With in 3 days 
Manuscript Registration : Within 5 days after Review Feedback 
Manuscript Publication : With in 5 days after Registration 


Publication Charges: 

For Indian Authors 
Standard Authors : INR 2000 
Editorial Board Members : INR 1800 

For Foreign Authors 

Standard Authors : USD 100 
Editorial Board Members : USD 80 

Why IJRITCC 
1.	IJRITCC is an International, Peer reviewed, Open Access Journal 
2.	Paper publishing process is relatively fast and easy 
3.	IJRITCC provides individual eCertificate to each author 
4.	Open access journal database for high visibility and promotion of your articles 
5.	Authors can submit the papers at any time by online submission 
6.	Paper will publish immediately in current issue after registration 
7.	IJRITCC accepts original and high quality research and technical papers 
8.	Authors can download their full length paper at any time 
9.	Author's queries shall be resolved within 24 hours of time 

NVITATION FOR REVIEW MEMBERS: 

We are happy invite all Scientists, Academician, Engineers, Scholars to work as review members for www.ijritcc.org. For joining as a review member, kindly send us your updated CV with photo. 


Regards 

Editor IJRITCC 
Research Department 
AUreicle Technologies Pvt. Ltd. 
www.ijritcc.org
You are subscribed to AURICLE TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD. If you do not wish to receive any further communications, please copy and paste this url into your browser to unsubscribe  




IJRITCC CFP  Citation in Google Scholar Impact Factor 5.098 May Issue DOI for each paper IC Value 5.075




Call for Papers
International Journal
on
Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication (IJRITCC)
www.ijritcc.org
Volume 3 Issue 5 May 2015
Published by: Research Department, Auricle Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
Member of CrossRef USA
Scientific Journal Impact Factor 5.837 IC Value 5.075 Citation in Google Scholar
Each paper is assigned DOI [Digital Object Identifier] from January 2015 issue
 
 We are pleased to inform you that IJRITCC is about to launch its next issue Volume 3, Issue 5, May 2015. The journal covers all areas of Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronics & Communication Engineering and its applications. We are publishing original research, review articles and technical notes in our journal. We would like to invite Faculty / PG Students/ Research Scholars to contribute their research papers to IJRITCC.

Kindly include research area (Ex: Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Marine Engineering) along with your paper.

  
Submit Manuscript Online by link below:
http://www.ijritcc.org/submit-your-paper
or 
Direct email to editor@ijritcc.org.
 
IJRITCC Manuscript Template: http://www.ijritcc.org/download/1412663194.doc
 
 Impact Factor Details and Indexing
CrossRef USA:10.17762/ijritcc2321-8169 
 IC Value (5.075): http://jml2012.indexcopernicus.com/masterlist.php?q=ijritcc
Impact Factor (5.098): http://www.sjifactor.inno-space.org/passport.php?id=1244

Citation in Google Scholar: http://scholar.google.co.in/scholar?q=ijritcc&btnG=&hl=en&as_sdt=0%2C5
Index in Academia.edu: https://ijritcc.academia.edu/ijritcc/
 
IJRITCC published research papers are cited and indexed in Google Scholar, Slideshare, Scribd, Academia,  Research Gate and many more International bodies.
 
  Anti Plagiarism
 We strictly do not accepts any kind of molded, already published or plagiarized research paper. So before sending your paper kindly check the plagiarism (How much of text is copied from which link?) at any one of below link:

 http://www.paperrater.com/plagiarism_checker#

 http://www.plagscan.com

 The result (average Value) of this should be greater than 60%. You can also submit your manuscript online:

 
Services to Conference Organizers:
Conference organizers can send a request mail to the Editor about details of the Conference. For any National/ International conference, we will take care of the following: Special Issue Publication, Research papers will be reviewed by us, promoting conference and eCertificate for each author.

 
About IJRITCC and Invitation for Review Members:
The "<stronginternational journal="" on="" recent="" and="" innovation="" trends="" in="" computing="" communication="">" is an open access peer-reviewed international forum for scientists and engineers involved in research to publish high quality and refereed papers.

 
We are happy invite all Scientists, Academician, Engineers, Scholars to work as review members for www.ijritcc.org. For joining as a review member, kindly send us your updated CV with photo to us at editor@ijritcc.org.
 
 
Published By: Research Department, Auricle Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Bikaner, Rajasthan, India.

Website: www.ijritcc.org Email: editor@ijritcc.org

 
Note: In case you are receiving our e-mail in your Junk-mail/Spam, mark this e-mail as Not Junk/Spam or add it to your Safe Sender's list
 
 






 You are subscribed to AURICLE TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD as foaad@calpoly.edu. If you do not wish to receive any further communications, please click here.
